about.title: About Me
about.profile: Full stack developer using .NET with a strong backend focus. I build clean, reliable APIs and data layers in C# and ASP.NET Core, and connect them to modern front ends when needed. I turn business workflows into working features with solid architecture, clean code, and attention to performance.
